(Jungle Rice) from'Tribe Paniceae''']] 'Panicoideae' is a subfamily of the true
grass family. It probably constitutes two well-distinct lineages, the
Andropogonodae and the Panicodae, which are further subdivided into tribes and
subtribes. Species of utmost agricultural importance belonging to this group is
maize, also known as corn (Zea).
